Name: Pocket Assault
About the game: In Pocket Assault you are pitted against infantry, snipers, jeeps, tanks, helicopters and drones. Hide behind protective barriers to stay alive while you aim and fire at enemy combatants. Some defeated opponents give you new weapons or additional health. Itâ€™s a simple shooter that is easy to learn, and fun to play. Work your way through 13 progressively challenging levels while using every means at your disposal simply by tapping on the touchscreen of your chosen device. Each enemy you defeat increases your score and your mission meter. Fill your mission meter to complete each level. Precise timing and a quick aim are required.
